pages.text: This Wrench can connect the $(l:rain_collector_controller)Rain Collector Controller$(/l) with its $(l:rain_collector)Rain Collectors$(/l).$(br2)Right click on a $(l:rain_collector_controller)Controller$(/l) to let is search for valid $(l:rain_collector)Collectors$(/l).$(br2)Right click a $(l:rain_collector)Collector$(/l) to give information if it already has a $(l:rain_collector_controller)Controller$(/l) connection.
The Wrench acts now as a tool and can break Waterworks blocks quickly.$(br2)It can be repaired with Iron Ingots and used as a slow weapon.
